analysis.key_quote: The independence of government workers, who lend their labor and service to our country over the long term, beyond the whims of any one administration is what makes our public institutions the envy of the world.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of nonpartisan civil service and the potential negative impact on government stability and independence, which aligns with concerns about politicization and merit-based systems.
